ing: 2 (5 ounce) containers sharp processed cheese spread
des: "This is a creamy blend of cheeses with green onions mixed in.  Always a crowd pleaser wherever I go and always the first to go! Adjust the amount of green onions to your taste. Serve with sliced bagels, or bagel chips."
ins: In a medium bowl, stir together the cream cheese, cheese spread and green onions. Refrigerate overnight before serving.
